Uses of Class
Matrix

    • Uses of Matrix in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Matrix 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Matrix Matrix.add​(Matrix one, Matrix two)
      Adds two arbitrary matrices together and returns a new matrix storing the result
      Matrix Matrix.clone()  
      static Matrix Matrix.createEchelonForm​(Matrix input)
      This will create and return an echelon form of the given matrix, without modifying the input's contents
      static Matrix Matrix.getMinor​(int i, int j, Matrix mat)
      Creates the (i, j) minor of a given matrix
      static Matrix Matrix.getRREF​(Matrix input)
      Given a matrix as an input, it will find that matrix's reduced row echelon form, returning that as a new matrix
      static Matrix Matrix.multiplyByScalar​(Matrix mat, double scalar)
      Multiply a given matrix by a scalar
